ubc.pavlab.gotrack.pmid

Class PmidAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • ubc.pavlab.gotrack.pmid.PmidAnalysis

  • public class PmidAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models the pubmed analysis
    Author:
    asedeno

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void analyzeAllSpecies()
      This code will run this analysis for all species
      void analyzeSpecies(java.lang.String species)
      Method to analyze a particular species.
      void analyzeSpeciesEvidenceCodeHistory(java.lang.Integer numberOfEditions, java.io.File[] geneAssociationFiles)
      Run evidence code analysis.
      void analyzeSpeciesPubmedHistory(java.lang.Integer numberOfEditions, java.io.File[] geneAssociationFiles)
      This function will try to get the pubmed date from the web page but since that is incredibly expensive, we have a set of pre-computed files per species that might already have the date, if we can't find it there, then we will look up the web page
      static void pubmedMappingAllAnnotations(java.lang.String species, java.util.logging.Logger log, java.lang.Integer startedtion)
      This function will traverse all the gene association files for a given species and try to map the pubmed id using files MuId-PmId-*.ids.gz as dictionaries The function will generate new gene association files with the mapped pubmed id and will produce a file called replacedPubmeds.txt that will save the mappings
      static void pubmedMappingForFile(java.io.File file, java.lang.String species, java.util.logging.Logger logger, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> dic, java.io.BufferedWriter replacedPubmeds)
      This function will map pubmed ids for a gene association file
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> readPubmedDateDictionary(java.lang.String species)
      This function will read file pubmedDatesMapping.txt inside the tmp folder for a given species then it will build a dictionary of pubmed id -> date that will be used to prevent the code from looking up the web page.
      void writeAnalysisEvidenceCode(java.lang.String species, java.lang.Integer numberOfEditions, java.lang.Integer[] missingEditions, java.lang.String outputFile)
      Write the evidence code analysis to a file
      void writeAnalysisPubmed(java.lang.String species, java.lang.Integer numberOfEditions, java.lang.Integer[] missingEditions, java.lang.String outputFile, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> pubmedDateDic)
      Write the analysis to the output file
      void writeEvidencePercentage(java.lang.Integer numberOfEditions, java.lang.String species)
      This will write the number of annotations per evidence code in each edition

      • readPubmedDateDictionary

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> readPubmedDateDictionary(java.lang.String species)
        This function will read file pubmedDatesMapping.txt inside the tmp folder for a given species then it will build a dictionary of pubmed id -> date that will be used to prevent the code from looking up the web page.
        Parameters:
        species -
        Returns:
        Dictionary (pubmed id, date)

      • writeAnalysisPubmed

        public void writeAnalysisPubmed(java.lang.String species,
                       java.lang.Integer numberOfEditions,
                       java.lang.Integer[] missingEditions,
                       java.lang.String outputFile,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> pubmedDateDic)
        Write the analysis to the output file
        Parameters:
        species - The species we are analyzing
        numberOfEditions - Max number of editions
        missingEditions - An array that keep track which editions are missing

      • analyzeSpeciesPubmedHistory

        public void analyzeSpeciesPubmedHistory(java.lang.Integer numberOfEditions,
                               java.io.File[] geneAssociationFiles)
        This function will try to get the pubmed date from the web page but since that is incredibly expensive, we have a set of pre-computed files per species that might already have the date, if we can't find it there, then we will look up the web page
        Parameters:
        numberOfEditions - Total number of editions
        geneAssociationFiles - Array of the gene association files

      • analyzeSpeciesEvidenceCodeHistory

        public void analyzeSpeciesEvidenceCodeHistory(java.lang.Integer numberOfEditions,
                                     java.io.File[] geneAssociationFiles)
        Run evidence code analysis. The function will fill dictionary speciesUniprotPmidEvidenceCode that contains a key made of the concatenation of uniprot + "|" + goid + "|" + pmid and the object is an array of the size numberOfEditions.
        Parameters:
        numberOfEditions -
        geneAssociationFiles -

      • writeEvidencePercentage

        public void writeEvidencePercentage(java.lang.Integer numberOfEditions,
                           java.lang.String species)
        This will write the number of annotations per evidence code in each edition
        Parameters:
        numberOfEditions -
        species -

      • analyzeSpecies

        public void analyzeSpecies(java.lang.String species)
        Method to analyze a particular species. This function might be called from main directly
        Parameters:
        species - Species to compute

      • analyzeAllSpecies

        public void analyzeAllSpecies()
        This code will run this analysis for all species

      • pubmedMappingForFile

        public static void pubmedMappingForFile(java.io.File file,
                        java.lang.String species,
                        java.util.logging.Logger logger,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> dic,
                        java.io.BufferedWriter replacedPubmeds)
        This function will map pubmed ids for a gene association file
        Parameters:
        file - Gene association file
        species - Species to compute
        logger -
        dic - Dictionary using files MuId-PmId-*.ids.gz
        replacedPubmeds - BufferedWriter that will keep track of which maps were done

      • pubmedMappingAllAnnotations

        public static void pubmedMappingAllAnnotations(java.lang.String species,
                               java.util.logging.Logger log,
                               java.lang.Integer startedtion)
        This function will traverse all the gene association files for a given species and try to map the pubmed id using files MuId-PmId-*.ids.gz as dictionaries The function will generate new gene association files with the mapped pubmed id and will produce a file called replacedPubmeds.txt that will save the mappings
        Parameters:
        species -
        log -
